metadata.title: CVE-2019-9544 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-628. An out of bounds write occursin AP4_CttsTableEntry::AP4_CttsTableEntry() located in Core/Ap4Array.h. Itcan be triggered by sending a crafted file to (for example) the mp42hlsbinary. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service (Segmentationfault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
